item.title: Setting up multiple GitHub accounts on one computer
item.description:
Due to my remote work setup, I needed to configure a company GitHub account on my personal computer.
However, GitHub doesn’t allow the same SSH key to be used across multiple accounts, which means I can’t assign my personal SSH key to the company’s GitHub account.

item.title: [Git Tutorial] Configuring Global gitignore Locally
item.description:
Do you include automatically generated editor configuration files in your .gitignore while developing a project?
Why add your personal environment settings to the project?
